message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $18000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $18000 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $14000 for it. Can you consider that?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. However, I've got to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $16500. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to pay $15500 for the product. Can you consider that?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $16000. That's as low as I can go. What do you think?
